an10.142:4.1: “I will teach you the principle that leads to increase and that which leads to decrease. …
an10.142:4.3: And what is the principle that leads to increase?
an10.142:4.4: Wrong view, wrong motivation, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong samādhi, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.142:4.6: This is called the principle that leads to increase.
an10.142:4.7: And what is the principle that leads to decrease?
an10.142:4.8: Right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right samādhi, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.142:4.10: This is called the principle that leads to decrease.”
